title: Trump: US trade deals near, but BRICs nations may get extra tariff
shortDescription: The U.S. is close to finalizing several trade pacts in the coming days and will notify other countries of higher tariff rates by July 9, Trump said.

title: Gaza activists: Trump deportation efforts go on trial
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge William Young in Boston ordered a trial in the deportations case, saying it was the "best way to get at truth."

title: Donald Trump slams Elon Musk over launch of new political party
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has sharply criticized Elon Musk following the billionaire’s announcement of a new political group, the America Party.

title: Haitians fear leaving US as Trump ends TPS
shortDescription: The Trump administration says conditions in Haiti have improved enough for migrants to return to the Caribbean nation. Haitians, Ohio gov. disagree.

title: Trump slams Musk after billionaire announces new political party
shortDescription: "I am saddened to watch Elon Musk go completely "off the rails," essentially becoming a TRAIN WRECK over the past five weeks,' Trump wrote on social media.

title: US close to several trade deals ahead of tariff deadline, Trump officials say
shortDescription: America is close to clinching several trade deals ahead of a July 9 deadline when higher tariffs were due to kick in, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said.

title: Trump treasury secretary criticizes Elon Musk's new political party
shortDescription: Bessent and Musk repeatedly clashed when Musk was part of the Trump administration.

title: 'Attack on rural America': Kentucky governor hits Trump's megabill
shortDescription: The Kentucky Democrat said around 200,000 people in his state are at risk of losing their health care under the bill.

title: Musk announces new political party after slamming Trump's megabill
shortDescription: "When it comes to bankrupting our country with waste & graft, we live in a one-party system, not a democracy," Musk said in the announcement.

title: Trump tells flooded Texas DHS help is on the way as search continues
shortDescription: The President said on social media that, 'Our Brave First Responders are on site doing what they do best,' as search for missing campers continues.

title: President Trump orders national parks entry fee
shortDescription: President Trump signed an executive order to charge foreign tourists more for entry into national parks.

title: Save thousands on a car by stacking Trump's tax credits with Biden's
shortDescription: Presidents Donald Trump and Joe Biden both created car-buying incentives. Here's how to take advantage of both now.

title: Texas asked for its money back on border security. Congress answered.
shortDescription: A new fund earmarks $10 billion for states that paid for border barriers or other security measures under President Joe Biden.

title: Trump signs sweeping tax cut and spending bill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed his sweeping tax cut and spending bill on the Fourth of July.

title: Trump signs tax-cutting, debt-boosting bill in White House ceremony
shortDescription: The measure cements into law much of Trump’s agenda and is being hailed by the president and his supporters as a major victory.

title: Big Beautiful Bill 101: What you need to know
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's Big Beautiful Bill just became law. Here are the basics you need to know about it.

title: Unusual Social Security email touts Trump bill. What to know.
shortDescription: An email from the agency praised the bill, but only some recipients will see savings. Here's what the legislation means for seniors.

title: Trump details Zelenskyy, Putin calls on Ukraine war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he was "disappointed" in Russian President Vladimir Putin saying he showed no signs of wanting to stop the war.

title: Russia pounds Kyiv hours after Trump-Putin call
shortDescription: Russia pummeled Kyiv with the largest drone attack of the war, hours after President Donald Trump spoke to Russia's Vladimir Putin, officials said.

title: Trump calls bankers a term long considered antisemitic
shortDescription: The president made the remark at a rally launching his yearlong celebration of America’s 250th birthday.

title: Trump says White House to host UFC fight
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the White House plans to host a UFC fight for America's 250th birthday next year.

title: Israeli military kills 15 in Gaza as Trump waits for Hamas ceasefire response
shortDescription: At least 15 Palestinians were killed overnight in an Israeli airstrike in Gaza, according to local health officials.

title: Happy cage fighting, America! Trump's UFC birthday plan and how it came to be
shortDescription: The president plans to host a UFC match at the White House. The proposal is just the latest round in a long-standing fascination with the octagon.
